typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		agt_description as string,
		agt_key as string,
		last_updated_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_claim_detail_pa.parquet']) ~> preDimClaimDetailPA
preDimClaimDetailPA derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
